#summary Ontology Design Pattern: Scientific Investigation
#sidebar SIOSideBar
=Investigation=
An [http://semanticscience.org/resource/SIO_000747 investigation] aims to uncover facts about an object of study. A scientific investigation (experiment or study) aims to provide facts to support or dispute a well formulated hypothesis.  Investigations _may_ involve:

 * the formulation of [http://semanticscience.org/resource/SIO_000284 hypothesis]
 * the development and/or adoption of a [http://semanticscience.org/resource/SIO_001041 study design]
 * the [http://semanticscience.org/resource/SIO_001049 selection, preparation or collection] of [http://semanticscience.org/resource/SIO_001050 sample(s)]
 * the [http://semanticscience.org/resource/SIO_001052 collection] of data through observation or [http://semanticscience.org/resource/SIO_001007 assay] 
 * the [http://semanticscience.org/resource/SIO_001051 analysis] of [http://semanticscience.org/resource/SIO_000089 data]
 * the preparation of an investigational [http://semanticscience.org/resource/SIO_001026 report]
